entry.title: Pita-what?

Pita-What?

this blog-site is a small exhibition of mini-projects made by student

representation of ideas, thoughts and inspiration encounter by student while taking a course for example: pattern, filters, object movement, colors can be observed

the objective of the course was using code as a thinking tool and medium to â€¦
entry.content:
Pita-What?

this blog-site is a small exhibition of mini-projects made by student

representation of ideas, thoughts and inspiration encounter by student while taking a course for example: pattern, filters, object movement, colors can be observed

the objective of the course was using code as a thinking tool and medium to create visual object

inspiration by art:

inspiration by math and science: Snell's window
